sentences.english: B：If I were any more ready, you wouldn’t stand a chance.
sentences.chinese: 我要是準備得再好一點的話，你就沒戲了。

sentences.english: As soon as your have a stylus, you're dead.
sentences.chinese: 只要有觸控筆，你們就沒戲了。

sentences.english: If one of you has a criminal record, whoops.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有犯罪記錄，唉，你沒戲了。

sentences.english: 'The referendum call is basically dead, ' said one senior Socialist party official.
sentences.chinese: 社會黨一位高級官員說，全民公投提案基本沒戲了。

sentences.english: If there's no rain within a month it really will be hopeless.
sentences.chinese: 如果一個月內不下雨就真沒戲了。

sentences.english: Sedan Chair If you do not, you are even occasionally the money gone.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不擡轎，你連偶爾的腳力錢也沒戲了。

sentences.english: Oh, looks like I'm a goner , its up to you now, old man.
sentences.chinese: 噢，看起來我沒戲了，剩下就看你的了。

sentences.english: things that are possibilities but that you know might not be available.
sentences.chinese: 這些事有發生的可能，但你自己知道基本是沒戲的。

sentences.english: Pessimistically, I think there is no good result in climate negotiation.
sentences.chinese: 我很悲觀的認爲，氣候談判沒戲了。

sentences.english: If you have not received the confirmation letter in one week, it will be unlikely that you can get the job.
sentences.chinese: 如果一週內你接不到確認信，這份工作就是沒戲了。

sentences.english: As far as the future, it didn't exist.
sentences.chinese: 至於我的將來，人人都認爲沒戲了。
